definition: (of trains) up (i.e. towards the capital)/(of river boats) to go against the current/to submit (a document) to higher authorities
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
subordinates follow the example of their superiors (idiom)

sentences.english: Still, those upward forces eventually will lose some of their oomph, he says.
sentences.chinese: 不過坦普爾說，這些上行力量最終將失去部分勢頭。

sentences.english: Of course, what the king does, everyone else copies, so everyone who was anyone wore high heels with red soles and heels.
sentences.chinese: 當然，上行下效，大家全都穿上了紅底紅跟的高跟鞋。

sentences.english: Pedestrians in deep sorrow on the road.
The ascending diatonic scale is the scale going up by step from lower to higher frequencies or pitches.
sentences.chinese: 上行自然音階爲依次由低到高上升的音。

sentences.english: If without critical bad news, the index will continue to rise up next week.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有重大利空消息，下週股指延續上行趨勢不變。

sentences.english: Behind the apicoposterior segmental vein, apicoposterior segmental artery ascended inside its corresponding bronchus .
sentences.chinese: 其後方，尖後段動脈上行於相應支氣管內側。

sentences.english: NOTE: The period of configured uplink grants is expressed in TTIs.
sentences.chinese: 已經配置的上行授權的週期用TTI來表示。

sentences.english: Prof. Sylla expects to see stocks turn more lastingly upward some time in the next two years.
sentences.chinese: 塞拉預計兩年後股市將回到持續期更長的上行走勢中。

sentences.english: There is little traffic on these roads.
sentences.chinese: 在這些路上行人和車輛很少。

sentences.english: This IE indicates the maximum and guaranteed bit rates of a GBR bearer for downlink and uplink.
sentences.chinese: 該IE指示上行鏈路和下行鏈路的最大保證速率。

sentences.english: The first chart is labeled "uplink reflected off the moon".
sentences.chinese: 第一個圖表標着“月球反射的上行鏈路”。

sentences.english: The uplink multiplexing sample transmission system is realized by use of this technology.
sentences.chinese: 並應用這一技術設計實現了上行線複用傳輸樣機系統。

sentences.english: Monetization of Ali-Loan earlier than expected would be an upside risk for share price.
sentences.chinese: 阿里貸款的提早貨幣化將是股價的上行風險。

sentences.english: Up-link synchronization In OFDM system is completed by ranging.
sentences.chinese: 正交頻分複用系統的上行同步需要測距來完成。

sentences.english: This is what permeates the consequences.
sentences.chinese: 這就是上行下效所帶來的結果。

sentences.english: that walking the course is essential to the game?
sentences.chinese: 在球場上行走時對比賽時必不可少的？

definition: (of trains) down (i.e. away from the capital)/(of river boats) to travel downstream/to issue (a document) to lower bureaucratic levels/(of writing on the page) vertical, proceeding from top to bottom

to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn

down/downward
exchange rate

to rise/to go up

to fall back (of water level or share prices)
to go down/to decline
